column4: I've been trying to get 9.04 or even 8.10 to work on my machine.  They both lock up every time a few seconds after the cursor comes up on the login screen.  I tried installing 9.04, from scratch and I get the same thing.. any ideas?
can you use ctl-alt-F1 to get to a terminal and have a look at the logs?
I can if I boot in rescue mode but i'm not sure where to look or what to look for
first place to start is /var/log/messages, also have a general rummage in /var/log for the X logs
